header.title: The Key To Find Dining
header.subtitle: Chase The New Flavour
header.description: Welcome to San Francisco in Loja, Ecuador! We're thrilled to welcome you to our restaurant, where we embrace the local gastronomy and delicacies that define our region. Our warm service, diverse flavors, and extensive menu options await to delight your senses. Join us for an unforgettable dining experience that celebrates the heart of Loja's culinary excellence.

about.description_1: At San Francisco, we are passionate about showcasing the best of Loja's culinary treasures.
about.description_1_expand: With a rich history, we celebrate local and international cuisines, inviting you to savor Loja's culinary heritage. Join us for a memorable dining experience that captures the essence of our beloved region in every delicious bite.
about.description_2: San Francisco stands as a testament to our enduring passion for showcasing the flavors that define our region.
about.description_2_expand: We take pride in our role as a culinary ambassador, welcoming guests from near and far to savor the authentic tastes of Loja. Our place's history is a tribute to the Ecuadorian culture, and we look forward to sharing this legacy with you, one delicious dish at a time.

chef.title: What We Believe In
chef.subtitle: Chef's Word
chef.description: At San Francisco, our culinary creations are brought to life by our talent and passion.
chef.description_2: With a deep appreciation for the art of cooking and a profound understanding of local flavors, these are the heart and soul of our kitchen
